quizzes.question: Fill in the blank to make the variable num a constant.
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Constants[/h1]

[b]Constants [/b]store a value that cannot be changed from their initial assignment.
To declare a constant, use the [b]const [/b]modifier.
For example: [code format="cs" ][b]const [/b]double PI = 3.14; [/code]
The value of const PI cannot be changed during program execution.
For example, an assignment statement later in the program will cause an error: [code format="cs" ]const double PI = 3.14;
PI = 8; //error[/code]
[note]Constants [b]must [/b]be initialized with a value when declared.[/note]
